meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Gotti's Son Is Arrested In another attempt to destroy the Gambino crime family, the Government has charged John Gotti's son, John Gotti Jr., and 39 others with extortion and fraud. Page B1.
Gotti's Son Is Arrested In another attempt to destroy the Gambino crime family, the Government has charged John Gotti's son, John Gotti Jr., and 39 others with extortion and fraud. Page B1.
New Condition From Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel has made ''final settlement'' talks a condition for any further Israeli withdrawal from the West Bank, officials said. Page A6.
Sting Catches 44 Officers In Cleveland, 44 law-enforcement officers from five agencies have been charged with taking money to protect cocaine traffickers. Page A16.
